org.apache.ambari.server.topology.addservice

Class ResourceProviderAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.topology.addservice.ResourceProviderAdapter

  • @Singleton
public class ResourceProviderAdapter
extends Object
    Creates resources using the resource providers. Translates AddServiceInfo to internal requests accepted by those.
